original_text: Give to the one who begs from you, and do not refuse the one who would borrow from you.
korean_text: 네게 구하는 자에게 주며 네게 꾸고자 하는 자에게 거절하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Give to the one who begs from you
and do not refuse the one who would borrow from you
sentences.korean_translation: 네게 꾸고자 하는 자를 거절하지 말라
